website_summaries.verdict: Top-selling ski goggles with user-friendly technology by a brand that's renown for producing quality eyewear for outdoor activities.
pros: Excellent fit without gaps, thanks to the wide lens and frameless design
Prism technology produces sharp clarity and lens coating prevents fog
cons: The price is high, but the quality is also superior
A few customers received the wrong goggles

customer_reviews.title: I ordered the flight deck model on 8th Nov. ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the flight deck model on 8th Nov. But today I received the A frame model. I don't understend how this thing can be happend, two models shap is totally different and price gap is huge. I returned it request the right product.
customer_reviews.author: HAM WOOYOUNG

customer_reviews.title: The best ski goggles I’ve ever seen!
customer_reviews.text: All in all, a great pair of goggles. I’ve been skiing for almost 20 years and these are the best ski goggles I’ve ever seen! Premium quality materials, lightweight, stylish and integrates seamlessly with Oakley helmet - no gap between the helmet & lenses. Overall, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Alex@FIGHTECH

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Oakley Goggles!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for the full face rimless lens design and the unbelievable clarity and glare blocking. These goggles are lightweight and comfortable (I don't wear a helmet so they are typically over my beanie. I have prescription inserts (large) from goggles n' more that fit perfectly in these. They look great on the outside but everything looks better from the inside. I highly recommend Oakley's Flight Deck goggle.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Toshiro S.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing frame-less goggles, best field of view
customer_reviews.text: Awesome goggles. The fit is great for my face and the visibility/field of view is definitely the best out there right now. I tried the Smith I/O, but the nose bridge did not fit at all for some reason and had a huge gap. Oakley on the other hand have their nose padding designed differently and it's much better. The only con I can say is that this only comes with a single lens compared to the other top end models from other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Oakley Perfection
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing Oakley optics for 2 decades. Yes, they may be overhyped and overpriced (thanks Luxotica, pricks), but Oakley has never let me down. They do what they say they will do and do it well. These feel great, look great, and they integrate perfect with my Oakley Helmet. Great perf vision, good airflow, never fog up.
customer_reviews.author: Luke B.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: IN LOVE WITH THEM!! I would buy them again with no doubt
customer_reviews.author: May G.

customer_reviews.title: Great Pair of Ski Goggles
customer_reviews.text: Great Pair of Ski Goggles. I had a lot of people ask me about it, and where I got it. This product is great against the rays of the sun. It is easy to put on, and the view is spectacular when you try to look at the sun directly. The color of the goggle is just great, and goes well with a lot of different color outfits. The elastic adjustment is easy, and it fits almost all different types of heads. I fell a lot during my first run, and these goggles can take a lot of beating. Amazing Product.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Chau

customer_reviews.title: Super good, love them
customer_reviews.text: Used them for a weekend only for the moment. They look amazing. They are confrotable. A tiny spot of fog appeared next to my nose when i was on the lift, it went away a soon as started to ski. I also bought another lense. It took me 10 min to understand how to replace it. But now that i know it took me 30 sec.
customer_reviews.author: Gab

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful goggles, great viewport
customer_reviews.text: Although, they aren't perfectly compatible with my giro helmet, they feel super comfortable, look amazing and dont ever fog. They also have a great viewport and are great against the sun.
customer_reviews.author: ashar

customer_reviews.title: Over the Glasses fit well!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to go over my glasses during snowboard season. They fogged a bit, but the quality of these goggles are great! Clear vision and large area of view
customer_reviews.author: Brian Kainz

customer_reviews.title: Works well until...
customer_reviews.text: Works well until you get into weather and then seems to fog up often.
customer_reviews.author: SSPrimeGuy

customer_reviews.title: Not even close
customer_reviews.text: Well this was an enormous disappointment! I ordered black iridium flight decks and received white amber line miners. Which I can find new for half the price of what I paid. Will be returning!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff A.

customer_reviews.title: would've expected better considering the price
customer_reviews.text: Came with a defective lens the seal was broken on the lens, didn't realize it until the return period had already ended, would've expected better considering the price, if I could could give it 0 stars I would, goggles instantly fogged up due to broken seal
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Feels like you're a pilot!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Great peripherals, comfortable fit and had zero issues with fogging even with a balaclava on. Gives you an awesome look and comfort. You definitely get noticed in these. If you want a slim profile goggle, you probably want to pick another option.
customer_reviews.author: UtmostCoin

customer_reviews.title: Really great goggles.
customer_reviews.text: Great great great goggles. The clarity and glare free visibility was awesome on a sunny day. Now I have to figure out which lens to get for low light days.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for Partly Sunny to Cloudy days
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for Partly Sunny to Cloudy days. Provides clarity and eliminates flat light on slight downward sloping runs , highlighting hard to see uneven terrain.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Ensig

customer_reviews.title: Sunlight, low light these lenses handle anything
customer_reviews.text: I owned the A frames back in the day. Been using other brands for year after my A’s were stolen. I forgot how incredible Oakley lenses are. Sunlight, low light, any kind of light these things rock. I will never go to any other brand. That and the look great with either a helmet or without.
customer_reviews.author: Kent Crockett

customer_reviews.title: RETURNED
customer_reviews.text: Came in an Oakley box and had an Oakley bag but the goggles were NOT Oakley and nothing like the picture, Someone replaced the item I order with some cheap not even close to the same goggles
customer_reviews.author: Beware!

customer_reviews.title: fits smith vantage helmet well
customer_reviews.text: switched to these from the oakley prizm canopy goggle. I wear a medium size smith vantage helmet and these fit the helmet and my face perfectly. cannot wait to ride with these.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I like it but it get a little foggy When you are wearing
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Prizim Lenses Helps Solve My Vision Problems
customer_reviews.text: Two LASIK procedures destroyed my vision. I have a horrible time when its sunny---the glare is blinding. And in low-light or flat light conditions I have a difficult time seeing subtle contrasts in color. I've been a timid skiier for some time now because I typically can't see terrain changes---everything looks the same to me so I stumble over unseen changes in the landscape. These goggles are not a complete cure. But they make a profound difference. I love them and can't imagine ever skiing without them again. They improve my vision enough to give me greater confidence and enjoyment. I can't wait to get a pair of good-looking women's sunglasses with the Prizim lenses.
customer_reviews.author: MW-D

customer_reviews.title: Forget they’re on.
customer_reviews.text: With other goggles, I would have them up a lot of the time. These I kept on all the time I skied. Great field of vision. They work in wide range of lighting conditions. Comfortable too.
customer_reviews.author: James Byrnes

customer_reviews.title: bad googles
customer_reviews.text: The product seems to be ok ...but in bad weather there is fog inside the googles...can not see any thing ...ruin my ski holiday.
customer_reviews.author: amir

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good overall quality, the rose lenses are a nice all-round choice.
customer_reviews.author: PSU

customer_reviews.title: A must have for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great peripheral vision, fits my smith helmet really well and has a rose colored tint. Fogging is not a problem.
customer_reviews.author: scott e.

customer_reviews.title: Best goggles
customer_reviews.text: Oakley flight deck goggles with prizm lenses are the best quality goggles you can get. The wide frame less goggle gives you great peripheral vision and the prizm lense is amazing. You can see every bump and contour of the slopes at any light.
customer_reviews.author: My Untidy Life

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Had a problem with lens fogging, but it's good now.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Fyfe

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect
customer_reviews.text: These are huge. Much larger than normal Oakley goggles. I have been wearing Oakley goggles in competition and for just regular all mountain skiing since I was 3. They are the only goggles I wear. Absolutely perfect
customer_reviews.author: Nofunofanykind

customer_reviews.title: The color of lens is not like what the picture shows
customer_reviews.text: The product is fake one. The color of lens is not like what the picture shows, and I took it to the oakley store to compare with the same mode. The lens color is fake. Also the foam padding is really rough, and it is very scratchy on my face. I can't believe that I spend so much money and get a fake one.
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Impressive design
customer_reviews.text: Tremendously satisfied with an excellent product. The panoramic view is sweeping, with bright clarity and solid protection and breathability.

customer_reviews.title: BEST SKI GOGGLES EVER!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son, and he says they are the best he's ever had. The views from the mountaintop are spectacular when he has these on. Well worth the money!!

customer_reviews.title: Great set of goggles, worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my wife, she absolutely loves them. They look great and don't fog up. Typical comfort of oakley goggles

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Goggles
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift. My grandson said they are Fabulous and well worth the money.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked great and the prism technology is great to see divots in the snow on a sunny day.

customer_reviews.title: Great visibility
customer_reviews.text: The visibility is great and they are very comfortable. I was worried about them being too big for using it with my helmet but the fit was no problem. Also, pretty good looking goggles.

customer_reviews.title: Love 'em!

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up.
customer_reviews.text: Good goggles, good field of view, clear, no blind spot, and doesn't fog up.

customer_reviews.title: Fits my large head comfortably plus keeps the wind and snow from my eyes
customer_reviews.text: I use these to protect the eyes when snowblowing. Fits my large head comfortably plus keeps the wind and snow from my eyes.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Best goggles I have ever had. They are comfortable and clear. They do not fog up.

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of goggles. Fantastic lense.
customer_reviews.text: Got them as a gift for my husband. He is in love with them. Says they are his favorite pair ever. And he has gone through quite a few to know!

customer_reviews.text: Great vision so far. No fog issues and they fit over my helmet just fine.

customer_reviews.text: These goggles are the best out there or my son wouldn't have wanted them for Christmas.

customer_reviews.title: smile maker
customer_reviews.text: gift for grandson. he sent me a picture as soon as he got it. he has a big smile on his face

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The lens failed during the first season. Fog forms in between the two lenses and cannot be removed. The warranty process is extremely painful. It took 45 minutes to complete the process as the required photo upload to the warranty website took 30 minutes. After all of this and two weeks later Oakley says that they have no record of my claim even though I received an email confirmation of my claim.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey A Warneke

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for my son, he says they are "sick!"
customer_reviews.author: ana

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Son was very happy with these goggles. He liked the fact that they fit over his glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... Every day I use this google And I am Pleased it always
customer_reviews.text: Last season Every day I use this google And I am Pleased it always.
customer_reviews.author: creatoryel

customer_reviews.title: Great Visibility - highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great all around goggles and the peripheral vision is phenomenal. Did not notice any real fogging issues and the fit is very comfortable. I purchased the fire iridium lenses, which seem best suited for a clear and sunny day. The visibility was lacking on a recent snow day so I ordered the Rose prizm replacement lens for an upcoming trip. All in all, a great pair of goggles. They do represent some logistics issues as not all goggle cases can accommodate their size. I would recommend them if you have a larger face and you're looking for the ultimate in unobstructed visibility.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: comfortable, and functions well on the mountain as advertised
customer_reviews.text: What can I say. These goggles are gorgeous, comfortable, and functions well on the mountain as advertised. Make this your next purchase you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Joe S.

customer_reviews.title: Great goggles for any condition
customer_reviews.text: Great goggles for any condition! I mainly night board and these goggles are amazing for seeing bumps at night. I'd absolutely buy another pair if I needed to, but they're pretty durable so far.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these goggles. Look great and fit well. Good peripheral vision.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: These are nice but have a huge
customer_reviews.text: These are nice but have a huge, HUGE lens. Too large for my liking, but can see how some would love them. Mine also showed up with a scratch so the iridium is obviously not very durable. I sent them back.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely sick.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the sickest goggles I've put on my face. Complete peripheral vision in all directions. Crystal clear clarity. Zero fog in a wide range of conditions. As close to perfect as you can get, IMO..

customer_reviews.title: Makes you FASTER.
customer_reviews.text: Makes me look like a fighter pilot, except on skis. No complaints. I think I'm going down the hill faster now with these... probably because Gravity is jealous of how awesome I look and is trying to pull them off my face. Yep. These are AWESOME.

customer_reviews.title: they ight

customer_reviews.title: One Star

customer_reviews.text: Great item - as expected. Outstanding quality. Awesome design. Perfect fit in combination with POC Scull Comp helmet. Microbag was missing in the box, unfortunately.

customer_reviews.title: Visibility great, but interferes with both my and husband's helmet/face ...
customer_reviews.text: as always, must try these on with your helmet. Visibility great, but interferes with both my and husband's helmet/face fit.

product_meta.title: Oakley Flight Deck Ski Goggles
product_meta.description: Inspired by the helmet visors of fighter pilots, Flight Deck maximizes your field of view so you won't miss a single target of opportunity. Peripheral and downward vision are wide open for spotting challenges and dangers and the interchangeable lens system lets you adapt to whatever the sky dishes out. The rimless design has wide-ranging helmet compatibility plus the comfort of minimized frame mass and it meets ANSI Z87.1 standards for impact resistance. With clean style and a field of view that's unparalleled, this is the ace of snow goggles.
feature_bullets: Snow goggles featuring logoed band and rimless lens design for improved peripheral vision
Lens sub-frame attachment for fast and easy lens changing
Platonize lens material for 100% protection against UVA, UVB, UVC and harmful blue light
Hand wash and air-dry the Microclear bag regularly
